## TGlHasExtension type

`true` if `TKey` is present in `TExts`<!-- -->, `false` otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGlHasExtension<TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys, TKey extends TGlExtensionKeys> = TNeverPredicate<Exclude<TKey, TExts>, true, false>;
```
<b>References:</b> [TGlExtensionKeys](./core.tglextensionkeys.md)
